title: India's Swiggy sees shares jump about 8% on debut after country's second-largest IPO this year
content: The IPO comprised of both a offer for sale of shares worth 68.28 billion rupees and a fresh issue of shares of 44.99 billion rupees.

title: Meta slashes EU Facebook and Instagram subscription fees by 40% to meet regional regulatory demands

title: 'The market is right': Former Fed policymaker Mester sees fewer rate cuts next year after Trump's victory
content: The U.S. Federal Reserve could carry out fewer rate cuts than previously expected next year should President-elect Donald Trump's proposed global tariffs take hold, former Fed policymaker Loretta Mester said Tuesday.
